definitions: the action of a train or trolley car leaving its tracks accidentally

examples.text: an investigation into the derailment of a freight train
track defects are being cited as the cause of the derailment

shortDefinitions: action of train or tram leaving its tracks accidentally

definitions: the obstruction of a process by diverting it from its intended course

examples.text: the derailment of the peace process

shortDefinitions: obstruction of process by diverting it from its intended course
